snippet.title: Rogue Station Defense - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Rogue Station Defense is a rogue-like tower defense game set in a sci-fi universe. You play as a commander tasked with clearing out infested planets and starbases from invading alien forces. Land your Construction Probe in these hostile environments and open the nests of invaders. Choose and customize your defenses to prevent the invaders from destroying your probe. Earn and spend resources on constructing more and better defenses and craft clever synergies between your towers. Do you have the the winning strategy for clearing out all invading nests?

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2948070/Rogue_Station_Defense/

Play for free on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cladcake.rltd4

THIS IS A PREVIEW OF THE DESKTOP VERSION
